'''Wisdom''' '''is best exemplified by the beautiful morgan garrett even though some people thought she was not smart she was verry smart and will go to a good college and is verry pretty unlike this person she knows named megan collins who is ugly and dumb!'''[[knowledge]], [[understanding]], [[experience]], discretion, and [[Intuition (knowledge)|intuitive understanding]], along with a capacity to apply these qualities well towards finding solutions to [[problem]]s. It is the judicious and purposeful application of knowledge that is valued in society. To some extent the terms wisdom and [[intelligence]] have similar and overlapping meanings. The status of wisdom or [[prudence]] as a [[virtue]] is recognized in [[cultural]], [[philosophical]] and [[religious]] sources.
+
'''Wisdom''' is [[knowledge]], [[understanding]], [[experience]], discretion, and [[Intuition (knowledge)|intuitive understanding]], along with a capacity to apply these qualities well towards finding solutions to [[problem]]s. It is the judicious and purposeful application of knowledge that is valued in society. To some extent the terms wisdom and [[intelligence]] have similar and overlapping meanings. The status of wisdom or [[prudence]] as a [[virtue]] is recognized in [[cultural]], [[philosophical]] and [[religious]] sources.
